title: Sentencing in Donald Trump’s hush money case postponed | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee is Trump’s pick for ambassador to Israel – a big win for Christian Zionists. More top stories on The Excerpt.

title: Trump appoints former PayPal exec David Sacks as AI, crypto czar
shortDescription: Trump — who once labeled crypto a scam — embraced digital assets during his campaign, promising to make the U.S. the "crypto capital of the planet."

title: Donald Trump gets Fox Nation Patriot of the Year award
shortDescription: The Patriot Awards “honor and recognize America’s finest patriots, including military veterans, first responders and other inspirational everyday heroes.”

title: Vivek Ramaswamy, Elon Musk on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Vivek Ramaswamy and Elon Musk, picked to run the new Department of Government Efficiency, met with lawmakers on Capitol Hill.

title: Democratic Sen. John Fetterman: Pardon Hunter Biden and Donald Trump
shortDescription: Sen. John Fetterman argued President Joe Biden’s son Hunter Biden and President-elect Donald Trump both deserve pardons after facing what he called “politically motivated” trials.

title: Republicans block bid to release results of Matt Gaetz ethics investigation
shortDescription: The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday blocked an effort to expedite the release of an ethics probe into former Rep. Matt Gaetz.

title: Chelsea Manning, trans rights activist protest at Capitol
shortDescription: The WikiLeaks whistleblower joined a protest of GOP-led effort to ban transgender women from using women’s bathrooms in Capitol and House buildings.

title: Hearing for Trump assassination attempt erupts in heated exchange
shortDescription: Acting director of the Secret Service Ronald Rowe entered into a shouting match with GOP Rep. Pat Fallon after a line of questioning touched on 9/11.

title: South Korean convoy picture not tied to martial law | Fact check
shortDescription: The image predates the martial law declaration by nearly a year. It was captured during a military training exercise in January.

title: Congressman, Secret Service head spar in hearing
shortDescription: Congressman Pat Fallon and active Secret Service director Ronald Rowe shouted at each other during a hearing on Trump's assassination attempt.

title: Pivotal GOP Sen. Joni Ernst suggests she doesn't yet support Pete Hegseth
shortDescription: Ernst, a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, will be critical to Hegseth's confirmation battle.

title: Will Biden preemptively pardon Trump foes before he takes office?
shortDescription: Senior aides to Joe Biden are discussing potential preemptive pardons for individuals they fear Trump could target in his next White House.

title: Trump bids on auctioneer and former Rep. Billy Long to lead IRS
shortDescription: Long previously worked as an auctioneer represented a district in Southwestern Missouri in Congress for 12 years.

title: More fallout in South Korea amid martial law backlash
shortDescription: An impeachment vote against South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is planned for Saturday after his surprise declaration of martial law met backlash.

title: Trump taps finance CEO to lead Social Security Administration
shortDescription: If confirmed, Bisignano would be tasked with ensuring the retiree fund's solvency.

title: Joe Biden's pardon of his son fuels debate over president's legacy
shortDescription: President Joe Biden's pardon of his son Hunter Biden was a gut-wrenching decision that his supporters and critics say will be remembered by history.

title: Trump asks Georgia appeals court to dismiss his criminal election case
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is asking for a Georgia court to throw out his state criminal case on election interference charges.

title: Sanctuary cities brace for Trump deportations
shortDescription: Los Angeles and New York have taken different approaches to sanctuary city status as Trump's second term approaches.
